definition: stupid/sluggish/clumsy/to wiggle (of worms)/to move in a disorderly fashion

sentences.english: I do something stupid, it's an off day.
sentences.chinese: 如果我做了蠢事，那是因为我那天不在状态。

sentences.english: You don't have to swallow every dumbass thing they espouse.
sentences.chinese: 你可没必要听信任何他们支持的蠢事。

sentences.english: It is also an admonishment to people to not deceive themselves or others.
sentences.chinese: 并也告诫人们不要做自欺欺人的蠢事。

sentences.english: A word in season from his father would have stopped him from acting so foolishly.
sentences.chinese: 他父亲及时提醒的话本可以阻止他干蠢事的。

sentences.english: I will stand by them, and I won't walk out just because they do kookie things.
sentences.chinese: 我要支持他们，我不能因为他们做了蠢事就弃之不顾。

sentences.english: We believe that it would be folly to try to isolate Russia.
sentences.chinese: 我们认为试图孤立俄罗斯是一件蠢事。

sentences.english: If nell will stop this foolery of sleeping on the sitting-room sofa.
sentences.chinese: 如果内尔不再干这种在起居室沙发上睡觉的蠢事的话。

sentences.english: It makes men do stupid things, like light candles and stuff.
sentences.chinese: 情人节令男人做蠢事，例如微弱的烛光之类。

sentences.english: He was betrayed by social ambitions into irreparable folly.
sentences.chinese: 由于社交方面的野心，他做出了无法补救的蠢事。

sentences.english: Of all the dipshit things to do.
sentences.chinese: 你做了那么多蠢事还不够啊？

sentences.english: When your friends do something stupid (8), you don't have to follow (9).
sentences.chinese: 你的朋友做蠢事，不表示你要效尤。

sentences.english: If you want to change the definition of the word order, can be described as Dry is a folly.
sentences.chinese: 你若要改变其定义中的语序，可谓是干蠢事了。

sentences.english: Obama has a first-rate group of economists on his side, which ensures that he will not do anything silly.
sentences.chinese: 欧巴马背后会有一批经济高手确保他不会做出蠢事。

sentences.english: "My dear Fortunato, " I said, "I'm afraid I have been very stupid.
sentences.chinese: “亲爱的菲顿纳多，”我说“我可能做了蠢事。

sentences.english: Love is the folly of men and the wit of God. Adore each other.
sentences.chinese: 爱情本是人干的蠢事，却又是上帝的智慧。

sentences.english: It's the cause of every single stupid thing you've ever done, basically.
sentences.chinese: 从根本上来说，它就是你所做过的每一件蠢事的原因。

definition: to harm others without benefiting oneself (idiom)
to offend Heaven and reason (idiom); bloody atrocities that cry to heaven/outrageous acts
to be foolish/to play dumb/to gaze absentmindedly
to overstep the bounds of what is proper/to take sth too far/(of a measuring device) to go off the scale
stupid/sluggish/clumsy/to wiggle (of worms)/to move in a disorderly fashion
arduous and thankless task (idiom); strenuous and unrewarding
